description:
Today is the annual festival. Many stalls have been set up, and everyone`s having a great time! Then comes the long-awaited Bon dance, and finally, an extravagant fireworks show! But the ones launching the fireworks are... the Zombie Bananyas?! Nyaaa nya-nyaaa!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ばなにゃとおまつり にゃ
